title: Riven Op to this new meta always seen always wins
body: Been playing alot lately and ive been seeing alot of rivens and every game she owns no matter what, they nerf zed but they dont nerf riven, riot only nerfs champs that are played alot is tournaments usually pro games but what about lower leagues, riven breaks top lane what ever champ i play she always beats me, im beating her early game and then once she gets her main item she already snow balls without any kills. it really annoys me that a champ is like this and it makes it very hard to win any fight due to her op shield her op wave clear, her op mobility and her op passive and ult which insta kills u. pls riot we need this champ a small debuff to her HOLY MACARONI SNOW ball factory.

My only real problem with her is the 100% AD scaling on her shield.
I am cool with high mobility champions...
But a 100% AD scaling shield that is a dash makes no sense.
No sense.
I'm not a big fan of shields that scale off of ad... It just doesn't seem right to me :/ But yeah, her shield needs to be much smaller than it is now. She dives towers so easily with it.

Yeah i understand how people are really big fans of riven and they want to to keep her op abilities, although u need to understand that riven is really op in every way with her kit making her very hard to counter, people say get tanky champs and wreck but a smart riven will just stay back and get farm without getting poked because of her shield, then once she gets rav she owns, and its not that the team is bad its that riven can almost do anything and she can easily recover from loses in game e.g. i had this game where i was wrecking riven with rumble and then once she hit lvl 6 and got rav she wrecked my anus and we hit late game where everyone was full build, riven could 1v5 our team and even if we tried to cc her it wont stop her huge amounts of mobility, all riven needs is a nerf to r and nerf to e late game and a small nerf to passive. Pls RIOT look at this
I love how no one knows that Olaf can beat riven ultra easily, but I agree riven is stupid, she simply has too much stuff in her kit.

Doesn't matter if you nerf Riven. "What is broken can be reforged." 
That said she's not that hard to deal with unless your team is %%%%%%ed. Like seriously. A decent team can manage a 3/0 Riven. Even if she has her core Hydra and Brut already. It's not like she's broken unless your team, you included keep making mistakes. That said. Just play Lissandra into her.

just pick nasus and rush fh.
gg ez.

Riven has been broken for a long time, her kit just has too much especially that shield which is beyond broken i mean 100% AD scaling shield on an extremely low cooldown, how the hell is this balanced?

Other champions have this problem as well such as Irelia, there's a reason why Morello hates her and has nerfed her repeatedly, shes a broken champion, the state of top lane is just pick a champion that is not only tanky but has a bunch of stupid stats and deals ridiculous amounts of damage, then just bring TP and you're set.

I miss the days when it was ignite and the champs actually had some good manly fights, such as Darius, Jayce, Tryndamere, Shen, Renekton and Olaf just to name some, see the difference between these champs and the champs being played today? These champs had really good battles in the top lane, they didn't just bring TP and farm for 20 minutes, before you got Darius and Jayce fighting each other in top lane just brawling it out, now you get Lissandra and Gnar who sit in lane and do nothing for the first half of the game but farm and then when they roam they just press R, the game is so stale now.

I miss the good old days.
